title: Brain Metastasis Velocity (BMV) Model
desc: The Brain Metastasis Velocity Model predicts overall survival after initial distant brain failure (DBF) following radiosurgery.

orgreference.text: Farris M, Mctyre ER, Cramer CK, et al. Brain Metastasis Velocity: A Novel Prognostic Metric Predictive of Overall Survival and Freedom From Whole-Brain Radiation Therapy After Distant Brain Failure Following Upfront Radiosurgery Alone. Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys. 2017;98(1):131-141.

data.evidence:
BMV, per year = x / y,

where the variables are as follows:

x = number of new brain metastases since initial SRS

y = total time interval between initial SRS and appearance of new brain metastases, in years
